snippet: The Mount Airy resort in the Poconos has not hit any of the projections set in 2006. Another region desperate to reinvent itself, the Catskills, could get its own gambling center.
abstract: Mount Airy Casino Resort in Mount Pocono, Pa, has fallen short of grandiose projections made in 2006 and community has seen little economic spillover; case of Mount Airy offers cautionary lesson for residents and elected leaders in Catskill Mountains, where New York State hopes to open up to four new casinos (Series: The Buy-In).

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and CHARLES V. BAGLI

lead_paragraph: The Mount Airy resort in the Poconos has not hit any of the projections set in 2006. Another region desperate to reinvent itself, the Catskills, could get its own gambling center.

headline.seo: Poconos Casino Offers Lesson as New York Weighs Proposals in Catskills
headline.main: In Faded Vacationland, Gambling’s Promise Falls Short
headline.print_headline: In Faded Vacationland, Casino’s Promise Falls Short
